attributes.action: Re-classify all drugs due to the recent Horizon Programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As most experts agree alcohol and cigarettes are more dangerous and addictive than ecstasy.
Alcohol causes more than 41,000 deaths in the UK every year yet the Government has promoted 24 hour drinking and made alcohol  cheaper than petrol??
The government is sanctioning drug dealing in allowing these drugs to be sold without proper controls or labeling
